results.overview: Explore the story of Austin Allen's activism and letter writing campaign as he contemplates his legacy from his new home.
results.title: Stonewall Postal Action Network

results.overview: "Out of the Grey" tells the story of Laura, a pregnant environmental refugee who is forced to leave her haven in the hope of finding medical support and safety for her unborn baby. The film touches on present-day issues such as the cost of living, global warming, and the refugee crisis in an inhospitable world.
results.title: Out of the Grey

results.original_title: Chiyo in blue, Qiyun in pink
results.overview: Out-of-date films and aggressive dyes. The simultaneous portrait of an encounter and a break-up.
results.title: Chiyo in blue, Qiyun in pink

results.overview: Julian Albans, the bully who left Beecher Prep, is visited by his Grandmère from Paris and is transformed by her remarkable story of compassion and courage. As a girl in Nazi-occupied France, the young Grandmère goes into hiding with the help of a schoolmate, a young man who risks everything to give her the chance to survive. Together, they find beauty and love in the secret world of their own creation.
results.title: White Bird

results.overview: When the children of an executed General are pursued in 1457 China, some heroic martial arts swordsmen intervene.
results.title: Dragon Inn

results.overview: Shortly after comic artist Adam responds to Internet trolls, he begins experiencing sleep paralysis. As he chronicles increasingly malevolent occurrences in a series of tweets, Adam begins to believe he is being haunted by the ghost of a dead child named David.
results.title: Dear David

results.overview: An expelled boxing champion, who now is a high-school teacher, witnesses intolerable violence and throws her first punch to build justice against it, while putting on a mask.
results.title: Brave Citizen

results.overview: Antoine and Olga, a French couple, have been living in a small village in Galicia for a long time. They practice eco-responsible agriculture and restore abandoned houses to facilitate repopulation. Everything should be idyllic but for their opposition to a wind turbine project that creates a serious conflict with their neighbors. The tension will rise to the point of irreparability.
results.title: The Beasts

results.overview: After murdering her young patient, a once-esteemed psychiatrist helplessly watches her life spiral into a nightmarish maelstrom of supernatural hysteria and gruesome deaths, all linked to a seemingly unstoppable ancient curse.
results.title: Suitable Flesh

results.overview: The Domino Revival, a gripping film that follows Mike Signorelli and a group of revivalists during a crucial time in history. As society's hunger for spiritual significance grows, witness the extraordinary power of Jesus Christ through Gospel preaching, verified miracles, overcoming despair, and deliverance from demons.
results.title: The Domino Revival

results.overview: Three close friends who have never left the outskirts of Dublin (much less Ireland) get the journey of a lifetime — a visit to Lourdes, the picturesque French town and place of miracles.
results.title: The Miracle Club

results.overview: Residents of a small rural town discover that a demon is about to be born among them. They desperately try to escape before the evil is born, but it may be too late.
results.title: When Evil Lurks

results.overview: A curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school is forced to remain on campus during Christmas break to babysit the handful of students with nowhere to go. Eventually, he forms an unlikely bond with one of them — a damaged, brainy troublemaker — and with the school’s head cook, who has just lost a son in Vietnam.
results.title: The Holdovers

results.overview: 1917. Bakary Diallo enlists in the French army to join his 17-year-old son, Thierno, who has been forcibly recruited. Sent to the front, they will have to face the war together. While Thierno learns to become a man, Bakary will do everything to bring him back safely.
results.title: Father & Soldier

results.overview: A gripping documentary exploring the afterlife based on real near-death experiences, conveyed by scientists, authors, and survivors.
results.title: After Death

results.overview: The arrogant, third most-wanted criminal in Taiwan, decides to get rid of the top two competitors and crowns himself the most-wanted criminal before dying.
results.title: The Pig, the Snake and the Pigeon

results.overview: A boy, bruised by life, finds his salvation through the love of his dogs.
results.title: Dogman

results.overview: On Chef Antonia's birthday, her estranged mother pays a surprise visit to the restaurant. Struggling with feeling abandoned by her mother when her twin brother died 10 years ago, Antonia imagines her brother urging reconciliation.
results.title: PANDA

results.overview: A group of Salem teens discover a cursed knife that unleashes a demon that forces them to play gruesome, deadly versions of childhood games where there can be no winners, only survivors.
results.title: All Fun and Games

results.overview: Bhagavanth Kesari's life takes an unexpected turn when he becomes the guardian of Vijaya Lakshmi, daughter of his jailer. Kesari, with his unwavering sense of justice, embarks on a journey to nurture Vijji into a resilient young woman aspiring to join the Indian army. Intertwined in this narrative is the presence of Rahul Sanghvi, a power-hungry tycoon whose connection with Bhagavanth and Vijji unravels hidden secrets.
results.title: Bhagavanth Kesari
